page.title: 16East Street Scheme,Bristol
page.content: The class couldn't decide whether to ban all traffic in East Street or to have buses only or even to leave things as they are. I think that kiosks would be a good idea: to put some water fountains near resting places so that people could feel a bit more relaxed. I suggest that more telephone booths and toilets should be provided. More seats for old people are needed. My class agrees with most of the plans for Bedminster and hope that Bedminster will become more popular and hope that more people will enjoy shopping there.
